dataList.dlg: My clock isn’t a magic cure-all for your problems… Don’t just charge in willy-nilly, okay?
Try to be a bit more careful with your health. No, I—I mean… I’m just worried for you is all.
Uhh… Aren’t you injured pretty bad? Should I start preparing myself?
You aren’t just charging face-first into danger since I can fix you up, right? Don’t get too reckless.
The enemy is staggered. It’s safe to attack.
Oh no, you’re in for a nasty beating…
Good, a Sinner has taken down a foe. Let’s keep this up.
A Sinner just died. I can bring them back later, at least…
The enemy will win at this rate. When that happens, I’ll have to turn my clock again.
Looks like things are in our favor? Let’s keep it going.
This looks like a critical moment, doesn’t it? I’m counting on you to make the right move.
I have the feeling our enemies are about to do something real bad. Brace yourselves, alright?
Is it just me, or… is something sinister approaching?
Good work there. I could tell you dealt a hard blow.
That’s a shame. Our attack didn’t seem to land that well.
Looks like that Sin was rather effective. We’ve got this.
Oh… That Sin wasn’t very effective. We’ll do better next time.
I think they’re up to some trickery, maybe? You should watch out.
Our enemies seem to be under the weather. We should take advantage of this.
I see you’re feeling better than usual. Let’s ride this momentum.
Looks like there’s been a bit of trouble. Are you alright? Well, not like I can do much to help…
Well done, we got one of the parts. Let’s deal with the rest like this.
You broke one of the enemy’s parts. We can do this.
Someone got seriously hurt, didn’t they?
An Identity has sustained severe damage.
That was great work you did there. Keep it rolling, will you?
Do again what you just did. You’ve another crushing blow in you, right?
A Sinner just took down multiple foes at once. I owe you some praise.
I know it’s the same tired old face for you… but here I am.
Ishmael… Don't listen to anyone else. Listen to what your heart tells you.
